title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body:
hello everyone !
im playing league for over a year now
and i had this problem maybe twice already
i fixed it in the past by just reinstalling the game
but this time it seems that no matter what i do, i cant fix it.
i tried to run as admin from everywhere you can do it.
i tried reinstalling.
i tried with the hextech repair tool.
and all the soulutions i find are going to the C\riot games and delete a few thing their. the thing is.. that i deleted all of those files.
cuz i tried to reinstall the game. and i cant go in the client whatsoever.
so i have no folder of league on my pc.
please help me :)
thanks

replies.body: Thanks for troubleshooting all though, although I wouldn't recommend deleting files as that can end up causing you more problems.  This sounds like a security setting problem, so reinstalling wouldn't really fix this but you were close by running as admin.  I suggest going over every step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your patcher has access to launch.  Let me know if you have any questions.
